about_the_game:
The worlds of humans and Furry have merged, and everyone must now learn how to coexist. You become the first and only human warden in charge of furry convicts. Your role is to maintain the prison, ensure order, and most importantly, guide four furry girls back onto the right path, as they've strayed somewhat along the way. You'll face moral challenges and dilemmas, where each conversation brings you closer to understanding what led these girls to their actions.

In this game, you will experience four deep stories with meticulously crafted dialogues with the furry girls. You'll need to talk to them, develop close bonds, and raise their sympathy levels. But remember! The rules strictly forbid any intimate or sexual relationship between a warden and inmates. This puts you in a challenging position: can you resist temptation and stay professional, or will you let relationships escalate and enter the forbidden zone?

Features:

Hours of engaging conversations, gradually uncovering the girls' personalities and pasts.

18+ = Hundreds of intimate scenes and sexual conversations with the furry girls.

Many mini-games.

Prison management.

Strong stories and emotions.
